channel.title: Hated by teacher's/staff at school quiz
channel.description:
To do this, if you have done it put an 'x' in the [] box. C&P than do the quiz, than post it on here for the rest of us.
Have you.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​.​
[code] [] Gotten a referral [] Gotten detention [] Gotten your cell phone/ipod taken away [ ] Gotten suspended [] Chewed gum during class
TOTAL SO FAR:
[] been late to a class more than 10 times [] Didn't do homework over 5 times [] Returned at least 2 projects in late.. [] Missed school cause you felt like it [] Skipped class at least 1 time [] Laughed so hard you got kicked out of class
TOTAL SO FAR:
[] Texted people during class [] Passed notes [] Threw stuff across the room [] Laughed at the teacher
TOTAL SO FAR:
[] Went on myspace, friendster, youtube, etc on the computer at school [] Took pictures during school hours [] Called people during school hours [] Listened to an ipod/cd player/mp3 during class [] Hit a teacher with a textbook
TOTAL SO FAR:
[] Threw something at the teacher [] Went outside the class room without permission [] Broke the dress code [] Failed a class, not a grade, a class [] Ate food during class TOTAL SO FAR:
[] Gotten a call home [] Couldn't go on a field trip cause you behaved bad [] Didn't take your stuff to school []Gotten a detention and didnt go [] Used passes from other days/Or made fake pass [] cursed during class loud enough so the teacher could hear
TOTAL SO FAR:
[] Slept in class [] Played basketball with paper balls using the trashcan as a basket [] Threatened a teacher/ told off a teacher [] Felt hungry during class and went home to eat [] Treat the teacher as invisible
total so far:
now times by 3 [/code]
Here's mine for an example
[code]
[ul][li]Gotten a referral[/li][li]Gotten detention[/li][li]Gotten your cell phone/ipod taken away[/li][/ul] [x ] Gotten suspended
[ul][li]Chewed gum during class[/li][/ul]
TOTAL SO FAR: 5
[] been late to a class more than 10 times
[ul][li]Didn't do homework over 5 times[/li][li]Returned at least 2 projects in late..[/li][li]Missed school cause you felt like it[/li][li]Skipped class at least 1 time[/li][li]Laughed so hard you got kicked out of class[/li][/ul]
TOTAL SO FAR: 10
[ul][li]Texted people during class[/li][li]Passed notes[/li][li]Threw stuff across the room[/li][li]Laughed at the teacher[/li][/ul]
TOTAL SO FAR: 14
[ul][li]Went on myspace, friendster, youtube, etc on the computer at school[/li][/ul] [] Took pictures during school hours [] Called people during school hours
[ul][li]Listened to an ipod/cd player/mp3 during class[/li][/ul] [] Hit a teacher with a textbook
TOTAL SO FAR: 16
[ul][li]Threw something at the teacher[/li][li]Went outside the class room without permission[/li][/ul] [] Broke the dress code
[ul][li]Failed a class, not a grade, a class[/li][li]Ate food during class[/li][/ul] TOTAL SO FAR: 20
[] Gotten a call home
[ul][li]Couldn't go on a field trip cause you behaved bad[/li][li]Didn't take your stuff to school[/li][/ul] []Gotten a detention and didnt go
[ul][li]Used passes from other days/Or made fake pass[/li][li]cursed during class loud enough so the teacher could hear[/li][/ul]
TOTAL SO FAR: 24
[ul][li]Slept in class[/li][li]Played basketball with paper balls using the trashcan as a basket[/li][/ul] [] Threatened a teacher/ told off a teacher [] Felt hungry during class and went home to eat [] Treat the teacher as invisible
total so far: 26 [/code]
I am 78% hated by teachers and staff!

item.title: Hated by teacher's/staff at school quiz

item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

[] Passed notes
[] Threw stuff across the room

[we cant its fucking blocked] Went on myspace, friendster, youtube, etc on the computer at school

[] Hit a teacher with a textbook

[] Went outside the class room without permission

[ul][li]Broke the dress code[/li][/ul]
[] Failed a class, not a grade, a class

[] Couldn't go on a field trip cause you behaved bad
[] Didn't take your stuff to school

[ul][li]Gotten a detention and didnt go[/li][/ul]
[?] Used passes from other days/Or made fake pass

[] Slept in class

[ul][li]Played basketball with paper balls using the trashcan as a basket[/li][/ul]
[] Threatened a teacher/ told off a teacher
[] Felt hungry during class and went home to eat
[] Treat the teacher as invisible

total so far: 1
total: 18
result: [b]54[/b]

I wasn’t sure about a few of them probably because you’re american and I’m not.

54… Either I’m a teachers pet or most of you guys didn’t answer honestly?

[ul][li]Gotten a referral[/li][li]Gotten detention[/li][/ul] [] Gotten your cell phone/ipod taken away [ ] Gotten suspended

[ul][li]Chewed gum during class[/li][/ul]

TOTAL SO FAR: 3

[ul][li]been late to a class more than 10 times[/li][li]Didn’t do homework over 5 times[/li][li]Returned at least 2 projects in late…[/li][/ul]
[] Missed school cause you felt like it

[ul][li]Skipped class at least 1 time[/li][li]Laughed so hard you got kicked out of class[/li][/ul]

TOTAL SO FAR: 5

[ul][li]Texted people during class[/li][li]Passed notes[/li][li]Threw stuff across the room[/li][li]Laughed at the teacher[/li][/ul]

TOTAL SO FAR: 4

[ul][li]Went on myspace, friendster, youtube, etc on the computer at school[/li][li]Took pictures during school hours[/li][li]Called people during school hours[/li][li]Listened to an ipod/cd player/mp3 during class[/li][/ul]
[] Hit a teacher with a textbook

TOTAL SO FAR:4

[] Threw something at the teacher

[ul][li]Went outside the class room without permission[/li][li]Broke the dress code[/li][/ul]
[] Failed a class, not a grade, a class

[ul][li]Ate food during class[/li][/ul]
TOTAL SO FAR: 3

[] Gotten a call home
[] Couldn’t go on a field trip cause you behaved bad

[ul][li]Didn’t take your stuff to school[/li][li]Gotten a detention and didnt go[/li][/ul]
[] Used passes from other days/Or made fake pass (passes?)

[ul][li]cursed during class loud enough so the teacher could hear[/li][/ul]

TOTAL SO FAR: 3

[ul][li]Slept in class[/li][li]Played basketball with paper balls using the trashcan as a basket[/li][/ul]
[] Threatened a teacher/ told off a teacher
[] Felt hungry during class and went home to eat
[] Treat the teacher as invisible

total so far: 2


3+5+4+4+3+3+2 = 24 * 3 = 72.

@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:2, topic:281495”]I can almost tick off every one of these =/

But there was only a few teachers I didnt like. Some were awesome. I dont go to school anymore but I’m still kinda friends with some teachers. I even have drinks with them and I’ve smoked pot with two of them at the club, lol.[/quote]
LMFGDAO!
Should of put this is the quiz:
Saying “STFU” to a teacher and them saying what’s that? <—Done that lewl
Made a teacher run after you
Purposly pulled the fire alarm
